title.rendered: Dirk Tavenner: Net Worth 2023, Career Earnings

content.rendered:
Summary

  • About Dirk Tavenner 
    • Early Career
    • Professional Career
  • Dirk Tavenner’s Net Worth in 2023
    • Career Earnings
  • Personal Details
    • Wife
    • How Old is Dirk Tavenner?
    • How tall is he?
    • What is his nationality?
    • FAQs About Dirk Tavenner

Dirk Tavenner is a professional rodeo contestant known for his exceptional skills in steer wrestling. Born and raised in Rigby, Idaho, Tavenner has made a name for himself in the world of rodeo, earning recognition and accolades for his performances.

Here you can follow Dirk Tavenner’s net worth, career earnings, professional career, achievements, relationship status, and more.

About Dirk Tavenner 

Tavenner was born in Rigby, Idaho, where he developed a passion for rodeo from a young age. His father, a cattle rancher and steer wrestler, served as a significant influence in his life. 

Tavenner spent his childhood learning and adapting to the world of rodeo, roping and riding from a very young age.

Early Career

Tavenner’s early career was marked by his dedication and commitment to the sport. He started as a tie-down roper during his teenage years, making it to the High School Finals twice. 

Despite his small stature, which was not ideal for steer wrestling, Tavenner was determined to succeed in the sport. He fine-tuned his technique and eventually became successful in steer wrestling.

Tavenner continued his rodeo career while attending New Mexico Highlands University in Las Vegas, where he was able to focus on improving his skills and made it to the College Finals.

Professional Career

Dirk Tavenner’s professional career in rodeo began when he joined the Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association (PRCA) in 2009. He has since made a name for himself in the world of rodeo, particularly in steer wrestling. 

Tavenner has qualified for the Wrangler National Finals Rodeo (NFR) three times, becoming a fan-favorite steer wrestler.

In 2021, Tavenner qualified for his first NFR, where he served as a hazer, a rider who helps keep the steer running straight in steer wrestling competitions.

Tavenner’s 2022 season was marked by consistency and significant paydays. He started Rodeo Houston by pulling the No. 4 check in the first round and ended with an eighth-place finish in the Super Shootout Championship Round. 

In 2023, Tavenner continued to excel in his career. He won the third round, the finals, and the average at the Days of ’47, pocketing $20,901, which catapulted him to seventh in the world standings.

He also had a record-setting trip in Salt Lake City, where a 3.0-second run in the Fourth Performance not only broke the arena record but also secured Tavenner’s trip to the Gold Medal Round.

Dirk Tavenner’s Net Worth in 2023

As of 2023, Tavenner’s net worth is estimated to be $2 million.

Career Earnings

Dirk Tavenner’s career earnings in rodeo have been substantial. As of 2023, his total career earnings amount to $704,975.

His earnings for the year 2022 were $127,177, with $42,645 of that amount coming from his performance at the 2022 Wrangler National Finals Rodeo.

In the 2023 regular season, Tavenner earned $107,839. He had significant wins at various rodeos throughout the year. For instance, he won $13,595 at the NFR Open in Colorado, $11,901 at the St. Paul Rodeo in Oregon, and $10,158 at the Greeley Stampede in Colorado. At the Utah Days of ’47 Rodeo in Salt Lake City, he won $20,359. He also had a successful run at the Deadwood Days of ’76 Rodeo in South Dakota, where he added more than $8,000 to his earnings.

Personal Details

Wife

Dirk Tavenner is married to Courtney, who works as a school teacher. The couple received exciting news in 2023 when they found out they were expecting their first child, with the much-anticipated birth of their daughter set to happen in March.

How Old is Dirk Tavenner?

He is 33 years old.

How tall is he?

He is 5 ft 10 in tall.

What is his nationality?

He is American.

FAQs About Dirk Tavenner

When did Dirk Tavenner start his professional rodeo career?

Dirk Tavenner started his professional rodeo career in 2009.

Who is his wife?

He married Courtney.

What is his net worth?

As of 2023, his net worth is $2 million.
